description: Everyday adventure, 3-layer GORE-TEX waterproof shell with lower impact construction. Ideal for hiking and hillwalking, it's built with 100% recycled, fluorocarbon-free fabric, a fluorocarbon-free membrane, and a low energy use solution-dyed backer.
name: Rab Namche GTX Jacket - Mens

specs.key: 75D Recycled GORE-TEX 3-Layer construction ePE waterproof technology with PFCecFree DWR (141 g/m²) HH
